p: This cross-sectional cohort study was performed at two US study sites. Day 1 assessments included the collection of participantsâ€™ characteristics, medical history and a photograph of the taping site for all participants. All participants underwent blood sampling and skin tape harvesting and, for participants who consented, an optional skin biopsy on day 1 ( online supplemental figure S1); participants with DLE and SCLE also received a skin examination and disease activity assessment.
